title: The Scream
subject: man
monologue: I can’t stop the ringing in my ears. The world is spinning, screaming back at me. Everything dissolves into terror. Do they see me? Or am I just noise in their silence?

title: Starry Night
subject: landscape
monologue: The sky won’t stop swirling. It speaks to me in blue and yellow. My thoughts spiral with it, fast, endless, beautiful. This night is alive, and so am I.
